Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,461Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: ‚ÄúWant to explain why you‚Äôve been wanting to chew Hen‚Äôs head off for weeks and yet now you‚Äôre excited about her going to space?‚Äù ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to chew her head off.‚Äù Buck crosses his arms defensively, leaning his hip against the table. He knows Eddie has him cornered on this.¬† ‚ÄúOh, so only when she‚Äôs hanging out with me or when we‚Äôre working together?‚Äù And there it is. Eddie‚Äôs clocked him. In spite of being caught, Buck can‚Äôt help the smile that blooms on his face. Eddie‚Äôs noticed, and he‚Äôs noticed enough to have strong thoughts about it. ‚ÄúNot sure what you mean.‚Äù ‚ÄúSo you aren‚Äôt jealous?‚Äù Eddie steps closer. Despite Eddie being slightly shorter than Buck, it feels like he‚Äôs looming over Buck as he stands his full height over Buck. "Before I get to know you guys, I wanted to introduce you to a new member of the team - Buck, come up here.‚ÄùEddie‚Äôs eyes follow Bobby‚Äôs gaze across the players, a jovial smile on his face, but when his eyes drift to Buck they widen back with lightning speed and his smile disappears. ‚ÄúEvan?‚Äù¬†¬† Shit. ¬†¬†¬†Or: Buck and Eddie met as teens one summer at 118 Football Training Camp - but they haven't spoken since. entry.title: All the Way Home (I'll Be Warm)
entry.summary:
Author: orionandhisdog

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,172Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: After living in Los Angeles for over 9 years and experiencing an incredible variety of disasters (both natural and human-caused), Buck knew better than to say he had seen it all. Every time he thought that maybe, just maybe, this was as crazy as it could get, the EMS gods would find a way to prove him wrong. A massive blizzard hitting LA a couple of weeks before Christmas was the latest disaster to do so.or A blizzard hits LA. Buck and Eddie find three ‚Äúplatonic‚Äù ways to warm up, and one decidedly not-platonic way.

entry.title: The Weather Outside Is Frightful
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,607Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 6

Summary: Athena plans a Christmas getaway to celebrate Bobby‚Äôs return, but a booking mix-up leaves Buck and Eddie sharing a two-bedroom cabin‚Ä¶ alone. The rest of the 118 ends up in the bigger cabin (and immediately continues there betting pool), while Chris quietly joins Team ‚ÄúMy Dad and Buck Need to Get Together Before Christmas.‚Äù What follows is a week of accidental couple‚Äôs activities, mistletoe mishaps, disastrous gingerbread houses, Buck teaching Eddie how to ski, snowball fights, and so many almost-moments neither of them will admit to. Buck‚Äôs convinced Eddie‚Äôs straight. Eddie‚Äôs convinced Buck could never want him back. And on Christmas Eve, when a storm traps them in their cabin, they finally have no choice but to talk about everything they‚Äôve been avoiding. A holiday trip, a slow burn, and two idiots in love trying very hard not to be. Or Buck and Eddie get stuck sharing a cabin during the 118‚Äôs Christmas vacation, and every holiday trope in existence decides to attack them at once. By Christmas Eve, the only thing more intense than the snowstorm is the truth they‚Äôve been avoiding.

entry.title: my empty cup on your nightstand (my bones in your teeth)
entry.summary:
Author: queerbaited_by_ABC

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,384Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 136

Summary: Buck's eyes widen to an almost comical degree as he comes to the conclusion of two things in real time‚Äîone, this bartender is about to out him to everyone here because he doesn't have the good sense to put two and two together and two, Buck absolutely cannot, not in a million fucking years, have his friends and loved ones find out he's a blood-sucking creature of the night because of one very frantic bartenders mix-up with some blood and a goddamn virgin Bloody Mary. So he does the only sensible thing to do and spits his drink out‚Äîright in Ravi's face. In front of everyone at the table. "Oh my god." Buck thinks he vaguely hears Chim and Hen whisper as he winces. Bobby looks at Buck like he‚Äôs grown a second head. Bucks too afraid to turn and see Eddies reaction.¬†‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî or - evan buckleys desperate struggle to avoid the chasm of love that has Eddies name engraved in it, even if maddie and chim are doing their absolute best to throw him into it, be it willingly or with Buck kicking and screaming the whole way there.

entry.title: this daydream (is dangerous)
entry.summary:
Author: lesmiserablol

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,328Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 92

Summary: For one singular moment, Christopher‚Äôs face lights up in that way it always does for Buck, thrilled to see him. But Buck can do nothing to stop the way his expression changes as he takes in the shirt that clearly belongs to Eddie, his hair that is so messy it can‚Äôt be chalked up to simple bed head, and the fact that Buck is here, in his house, in the morning after a late shift. Christopher‚Äôs expression shutters closed in a way that Buck has never been on the receiving end of, and he feels his stomach drop. (or, Christopher finds out about Buck and Eddie's relationship before they get the chance to tell him. They deal with the aftermath)

Summary: Buck lost his job, his apartment, and his boyfriend. So naturally, he became a nanny. Now he‚Äôs living with the most amazing kid, a last-minute Christmas crisis, there‚Äôs also a ghost and the world‚Äôs hottest (and most emotionally unavailable) cardio thoracic surgeon. What could possibly go wrong? So it‚Äôs slightly based on The Nanny (1993) so yes Buck is Fran Fine and Eddie is Maxwell Sheffield.
